means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 莫尔德 Moult的变体

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"使成形"之意。
means: mould ： 通常指把有延展性的材料浇铸或塑成所需形状的物品。
forge ： 意义较窄，指用锤子和砧对金属材料进行加工或锻造。
form ： 通常指对尚未成形的物品作进一步加工，使成为成品。
shape比mould使用广泛，指用许多不同的方法制成不同形状的制品。

word_mean: proof agent 防止食品霉变的添加剂。

sentence.Network_en: If damp, musty buildings make you ill, mould is probably the cause.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果潮湿发霉的建筑令你生病了，霉菌很可能是病因。

sentence.Network_en: Using 2 spoons, mould the cheese mixture into small balls or ovals.
sentence.Network_cn: 用两把小匙将奶酪混合物塑成圆球或椭圆球形状。

sentence.Network_en: Spoon the mixture carefully into the mould.
sentence.Network_cn: 用勺小心地把混合物舀起，倒入模具内。

jx.jx_en_mean: put an end to a restrictive pattern of events or behaviour by doing things in a markedly different way
jx.jx_cn_mean: 打破常规，摆脱条条框框

lj.lj_ly: his work did much to break the mould of the old urban sociology.
lj.lj_ls: 他的工作对于打破旧的城市社会学模式起了很大作用。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: apparently from Old French modle, from Latin modulus (see modulus)
late Middle English: probably from obsolete mould, past participle of moul 'grow mouldy', of Scandinavian origin; compare with Old Norse mygla 'grow mouldy'
Old English molde, from a Germanic base meaning 'pulverize or grind'; related to meal

entry.def: A mould is a hollow container that you pour liquid into. When the liquid becomes solid, it takes the same shape as the mould.

example.ex: Spoon the mixture carefully into the mould...
example.tran: 用勺小心地把混合物舀起，倒入模具内。

example.ex: The moulds for the foundry are made in the tool-room area.
example.tran: 铸造车间的模具是在工具间生产的。

entry.tran: (性格、态度、行为或生活方式的)模式，类型
entry.def: If a person fits into or is cast in a mould of a particular kind, they have the characteristics, attitudes, behaviour, or lifestyle that are typical of that type of person.

example.ex: At first sight, Joe Pesci is not exactly cast in the leading man mould...
example.tran: 第一眼看上去，乔·佩希并不是当领袖的料。

example.ex: He was from the same mould as the men she had gazed at worshipfully when a child: rich, handsome, of impeccable social standing.
example.tran: 他富有、英俊，有无可挑剔的社会地位，是她孩提时就仰慕的那种男人。

entry.def: If you mould a soft substance such as  plastic or clay, you make it into a particular shape or into an object.

example.ex: Using 2 spoons, mould the cheese mixture into small balls or ovals...
example.tran: 用两把小匙将奶酪混合物塑成圆球或椭圆球形状。

example.ex: Before we left the camp, my twin brother and I moulded a chair out of mud.
example.tran: 离开营地前，我和孪生弟弟用泥巴做了一把椅子。

entry.def: To mould someone or something means to change or influence them over a period of time so that they develop in a particular way.

example.ex: She was only 17 at the time and the experience moulded her personality...
example.tran: 那时她只有17岁，那次经历影响了她的性格。

example.ex: Here we outline some of the sometimes conflicting forces moulding the debate...
example.tran: 在此我们概述一些有时影响争论的相互对立的力量。

entry.def: When something moulds to an object or when you mould it there, it fits round the object tightly so that the shape of the object can still be seen.

example.ex: You need a malleable pillow that will mould to the curves of your neck...
example.tran: 你需要一个柔韧性好、能与你的颈椎弯曲弧度相吻合的枕头。

example.ex: She stood there, the wind moulding the dress around her.
example.tran: 她站在那儿，风把套裙吹得紧紧裹在身上。

entry.def: Mould is a soft grey, green, or blue substance that sometimes forms in spots on old food or on damp walls or clothes.

means.word_mean: 1. loose soil rich in organic matter
2. a fungus that produces a superficial growth on various kinds of damp or decaying organic matter
4. container into which liquid is poured to create a given shape when it hardens
2. form by pouring (e.g., wax or hot metal) into a cast or mold;
3. make something, usually for a specific function;

auth_sentence.content: Vast naked Rocks without the least sign of Mould.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vast naked Rocks without the least sign of Mould.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vast naked Rocks without the least sign of Mould.

auth_sentence.content: Lift the mould off the jelly carefully and serve.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lift the mould off the jelly carefully and serve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lift the mould off the jelly carefully and serve.

auth_sentence.content: Wrap the outside of the mould with aluminium foil.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wrap the outside of the mould with aluminium foil.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wrap the outside of the mould with aluminium foil.

sentences.en: This is a mould of pudding.
sentences.cn: 这是在模子中做成的布丁。

sentences.en: He is a man of gentle mould.
Mould spreads quickly and can cover something completely.
sentences.cn: 霉蔓延得很快, 有时会完全覆盖发霉物体的表面。

sentences.en: They moulded a figure in clay.
sentences.cn: 他们用模子做泥塑人像。

jushi.english: They melted down the lead and poured it into moulds.
jushi.chinese: 他们把铅熔化,倒进模型里。

jushi.english: He is a man of gentle mould.
This is a mould of pudding.
jushi.chinese: 这是在模子中做成的布丁。
